title: Let's Have a Parade With Really Big Missiles!
description:
Trump's unguided missile of a UN speech was not the only thing flying around the Deep State this week.  On this episode of Deep State Radio,  the heart of our line up, Kori Schake of Stanford University, Rosa. Brooks of Georgetown University and host,  David Rothkopf, consider the state of the Trump-Russia investigation, the reasons for the presidents appetite for really big, manly military equipment, and lots of other reasons why we like it just fine deep in our silos.  Tune in!Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/deepstateradio.
